author: William Mansell
title: Coronavirus updates: FDA warns Infowars against selling alleged COVID-19 treatments
description: The global death toll for the novel coronavirus nears 100,000.
content:
The global novel coronavirus pandemic death toll is nearing 100,000 as more than 95,000 have now died from the disease.
In New York state, over 160,000 people have been diagnosed with COVID-19, the disease caused by the new respiratory virus, according to da… [+2337 chars]
